short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Suit up for battle with a Space Marine live wallpaper that brings the power of the galaxy's greatest warriors to your browser!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Prepare for war with the Space Marine Live Wallpaper extension, designed for fans of epic sci-fi action and galactic warfare! Every time you open a new tab, you'll be greeted by the iconic armored warriors of the Warhammer 40k universe. Watch as your Space Marine charges into battle, ready to face the chaos of the galaxy, with powerful animations that bring their strength, determination, and unyielding courage to life. Whether they're locking into combat or standing tall amidst the ruins of a battlefield, the energy of these fearless warriors is sure to inspire you.

Beyond the intense visuals, this extension is packed with useful features to enhance your browsing experience. With customizable site shortcuts, you can quickly access your most visited websites. The integrated Google search bar lets you find what you need instantly, while the clock and date widget ensures you stay on top of time, even when the universe feels like it‚Äôs on the edge of chaos.

üí• Live Wallpaper: Animated scenes featuring Space Marines in action, with powerful, dynamic movements and battle-ready designs.

üîç Google Search Bar: Quick, easy web searches directly from your new tab.

üåê Site Shortcuts: Customize shortcuts for fast access to your favorite websites.

‚è∞ Clock & Date Widget: A sleek and functional clock and date display to keep you organized in the heat of battle.

Bring the power and bravery of Space Marines to your browser and make every new tab feel like a mission-ready adventure in the Warhammer 40k universe!
